examples.example: 他热情主动地向我介绍了这座城市有趣的地方。

translate.english: He enthusiastically and proactively he introduced the interesting places in this city to me.

examples.example: 我很高兴能为大家介绍我们公司的新产品。

translate.english: I am very glad to be able to introduce the new products of our company to everyone.

examples.example: 他真诚地向朋友们介绍自己家乡的风土人情。

translate.english: He sincerely introduces the local customs and practices of his hometown to his friends.
